title: Darkness at Noon
description: A man who dances on the line between cop and criminal finally breaks bad.
quote: People just think there are black hats and white hats. There are black hats with white linings. White hats with black linings. And there are hats that change back and forth between white and black. There are striped hats.
altHero: Charlie Pollock walks across a bridge with the city in the background

alt2: Marta Reiman interrogates a homeless man

alt4: Pollock lays on the grass, blood dripping from his mouth
